attributes.action: Encourage news outlets in the UK to become unbiased by implementing...
attributes.additional_details:
This will ensure the British public are well informed with a balanced knowledge.

Pave the way to potentially phase out the TV licence which unfairly favours the 'unbias' BBC by ensuring all major news outlets are truly unbiased, whilst still maintaining their current revenue streams.
attributes.background: Encourage news outlets in the UK to become unbiased, by implementing an independent body that will accredit them, if they can demonstrate they reliability produce unbiased news.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Replace the current press self regulatory system with a statutory regulator: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300246

Ensure balance and fairness in political reporting: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300700
